name: Jumping the Gun (WallJumpGames)
description:
If you rate this game and would like me to rate yours in a YouTube video, leave a comment expressing interest, my channel is on my creator page :)

Oh shoot! Your legs broke. After 3 months of intensive surgery, you can now walk (slowly), and jump (a little). Randomly, you find a gun, and it fuses to your arm. Oh no! Or maybe, oh yes? You can use its knockback and explosive blast to move around! But it is joined to your arm. So if it runs out of ammo, your arm fails, and you have to go back to hospital. That’s a bummer. So maybe don’t run out of ammo. Reach the end of the game where you reach Gunland, where your new self will be accepted!

- 5 Levels of Platforming Fun

- 3 Powerups

- Explosions

- Screenshake

- Did I mention explosions?

-Have fun :)

(also a really great song I found on Filmmusic.io)

Jazzi Reloaded by Frank Schröter

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/7633-jazzi-reloaded

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Here's a section called IF I EVER POST-JAMMED!
1. More Levels

2. Even more juice (eg. Squash and Stretch)

3. Better pacing and utilisation of the powerups

4. More powerups

5. An endless mode

6. Polish

7. A Heck of a lot more other stuff

would you be interested?
